member.name: T:YourLastAboutDialog.Views.NavigationPhoneApplicationPage
member.summary: A class derived from the PhoneApplicationPage class. Makes use of the NavigationViewModelBase view model base class to notify the view model about navigation events.

member.name: F:YourLastAboutDialog.AboutPage.SelectedPivotItemIndexKey
member.summary: A key used to indicate what pivot item should be pre-selected in the about dialog, based on the item index. Use this as query parameter.

member.name: F:YourLastAboutDialog.AboutPage.SelectedPivotItemHeaderKey
member.summary: A key used to indicate what pivot item should be pre-selected in the about dialog, based on the item header. Use this as query parameter.

member.name: F:YourLastAboutDialog.AboutPage.ForceBuyButtonKey
member.summary: A key used to indicate that the "Buy this app!" button should be shown even when the app does not run in trial mode (this is helpful if you do not use the built-in trial mode, but are running a free "lite" version of your app). Use this as query parameter, and set the value to "True" to override the default behavior.

member.name: T:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.HighlightingConverter
member.summary: A value converter that converts an array of strings into a nicely formatted list of text blocks contained in a stack panel.

member.name: M:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.HighlightingConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the source data before passing it to the target for display in the UI.
member.param: The source data being passed to the target.
The of data expected by the target dependency property.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The culture of the conversion.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the target dependency property.

member.name: M:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.HighlightingConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the target data before passing it to the source object. This method is called only in bindings.
member.param: The target data being passed to the source.
The of data expected by the source object.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The culture of the conversion.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the source object.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.HighlightingConverter.TextTitleStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the text title style.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.HighlightingConverter.TextNormalStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the text normal style.

member.name: T:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.LocalizationHelper
member.summary: A helper class for localization issues.

member.name: M:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.LocalizationHelper.GetCultureNameLocalizedUri(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the country code localized URI. Simply splits the file name part of the uri and adds the current culture name to it, e.g. http://localhost/file.ext and a current culture of "de-DE" is turned into http://localhost/file.de-DE.ext
member.param: The URI to localize.
member.returns: The URI, extended by the current culture name between the file name and extension.

member.name: M:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.LocalizationHelper.GetLanguageCodeLocalizedUri(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the language code localized URI. Simply splits the file name part of the uri and adds the current two-letter ISO language name to it, e.g. http://localhost/file.ext and a current culture of "de-DE" is turned into http://localhost/file.de.ext
member.param: The URI to localize.
member.returns: The URI, extended by the current two-letter ISO language name between the file name and extension.

member.name: T:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.ManifestAppInfo
member.summary: Extracts the information contained in the WMAppManifest.xml file. Extended and improved version based on a post by Joost van Schaik: http://dotnetbyexample.blogspot.com/2011/03/easy-access-to-wmappmanifestxml-app.html

member.summary: Gets the description in the WMAppManifest.xml or null if this information could not be retrieved.

member.summary: Gets the author in the WMAppManifest.xml or null if this information could not be retrieved.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Common.ManifestAppInfo.Publisher
member.summary: Gets the publisher in the WMAppManifest.xml or null if this information could not be retrieved.

member.name: T:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.ItemData
member.summary: A container class for all the information needed to create a pivot item.

member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the pivot item.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.ItemData.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the uri where the content of the page should be downloaded from. If this is null, the is used.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.ItemData.ItemType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the content, used for the formatting/preparation of the page.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.ItemData.OfflineContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternate content that is used when downloading the content from the remote Uri fails, or if no Uri is given at all. The property is respected for this content too.

member.summary: The possible content type of items.

member.name: F:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.ItemType.Text
member.summary: The item contains text content.

member.summary: The item contains XAML content.

member.summary: Gets an empty link data object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the uri used as navigation target.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content used as display.

member.summary: Gets or sets an additional label that is not part of the hyperlink button.

member.name: T:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData
member.summary: A container class for all the information needed to create the main item.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the main item.

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppAuthorLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the label that should be used for the author. Default is "by".

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppDescriptionLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the label that should be used for the description. Default is "Description:".

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppPublisherLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the label that should be used for the publisher. Default is "Publisher:".

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppVersionLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the label that should be used for the version. Default is "Version:".

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppAdditionalNotesLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the label that should be used for the additional notes. Default is "Additional notes:".

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppReviewButtonContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the content that should be used for the review button. Default is "Review this app!".

member.name: P:YourLastAboutDialog.Models.MainItemData.AppBuyButtonContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the content that should be used for the buy button. Default is "Buy this app!".
